Summary Regina is a Program Manager, social good enthusiast, and approaches opportunity by creating shared value. She’s worked in the US and abroad across commerce, sales and corporate engineering at Google since 2002. She's led efforts for AdWords, Benefits, Corporate Engineering, DoubleClick, Learning, People Development and Wallet. To acknowledge the perspective and opportunity culture brings to work, she co-founded the Filipino Googler Network (FGN) in 2011. She is Chair of the employee resource group and recently enabled Googlers from around the globe to partner with non-governmental organizations (NGOs) in-region post Typhoon Haiyan. Outside of work she enjoys experiencing the world through the eyes of her young girls, supporting early stage tech and volunteering with groups focused on female empowerment. She is a board member of the Apl.de.Ap Foundation and Philippine International Aid.
